citation: Electricity Supply Industry Concession Amendment Order 2022 (Tas)
text:
Electricity Supply Industry Concession Amendment Order 2022

I make the following order under section 43D of the Electricity Supply Industry Act 1995 .

23 June 2022

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Treasurer

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Electricity Supply Industry Concession Amendment Order 2022 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2022.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Electricity Supply Industry Concession Order 2016 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Electricity Supply Industry Concession Order 2016 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Electricity Supply Industry Concession Order 2016 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Electricity Supply Industry Concession Order 2016 .

7.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Electricity Supply Industry Concession Order 2016 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 June 2022

This order is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
